strings.SS2_PYRO_DESCRIPTION: The Pyro is a survivor who excels in crowd control, torching pests with fury and precision.
strings.SS2_PYRO_OUTRO_FLAVOR: ..and so he left, heart burning with passion.
strings.SS2_KEYWORD_HEAT: <style=cKeywordName>Heat</style><style=cSub>Resource gained via Passive and Primary, and spent on other skills.
strings.SS2_KEYWORD_COMBUSTING: <style=cKeywordName>Combusting</style><style=cSub>Resets the duration of ignite stacks each second.
strings.SS2_KEYWORD_TORCHING: <style=cKeywordName>Torching</style><style=cSub>Deals 1.5x increased damage and ignite chance at the furthest end of the flame.
strings.SS2_PYRO_PASSIVE_DESC: Gain <color=#D78326>heat</color>, <style=cIsUtility>armor</style>, and <style=cIsHealing>regen</style> based on the number of nearby burning enemies. Immune to <style=cIsDamage>Ignite</style>.
strings.SS2_PYRO_PRIMARY_DESC: <style=cIsDamage>Torching</style>. <color=#D78326>Heat up</color> by burning enemies for <style=cIsDamage>40% damage</style>. May <style=cIsDamage>ignite</style> enemies at <color=#D78326>high heat</color>.
strings.SS2_PYRO_SECONDARY_DESC: <color=#D78326>Consume 1.5% heat</color> to burn enemies for <style=cIsDamage>80% damage</style>, pushing them back. <style=cIsDamage>Increased damage</style> at <color=#D78326>high heat</color>. <style=cIsHealth>TO-DO: Make Primary + Scondary skills show heat / damage per second rather than tick?
strings.SS2_PYRO_SECONDARY_ALT_DESC: <color=#D78326>30% heat</color>. Fire a burst of flames, <color=#D78326>igniting</color> enemies for <style=cIsDamage>400% damage</style> and <style=cIsUtility>reflecting projectiles</style>. Extra stocks <color=#D78326>reduce heat consumption by 15%</color>.
strings.SS2_PYRO_UTILITY_DESC: Launch <style=cIsUtility>forward</style> for <color=#D78326>35% heat</color>. In the air, launch <style=cIsUtility>upward</style> instead. <style=cIsUtility>Hold</style> to slow your fall for <color=#D78326>2% heat</color> per second.
strings.SS2_PYRO_SPECIAL_DESC: <style=cIsDamage>Ignite</style>. Launch a fireball that deals <style=cIsDamage>400% damage</style> for <color=#D78326>65% heat</color>. Explodes on hit for <style=cIsDamage>150%</style> per stack of <style=cIsDamage>Ignite</style> on the target.
strings.SS2_PYRO_SPECIAL_ALT_DESC: <style=cIsDamage>Combusting</style>. Fire a shotgun burst for <style=cIsDamage>8x50% damage</style>.
